name: Devony Bowden
text: Great 2nd experience with Glass Orthodontics!! Both of the offices I have visited  so far are clean and aesthetically pleasing! The staff is friendly and the way the use an open interaction approach is awesome! Can't wait to see my handsome young man's smile when they have finished with their magic touch!!

resp.text: Thank you for the 5 star review! We are very excited for you guys!!!

name: Pandal Carter
text:
You guys if you are looking for a great Orthodontist and Team. Stop looking and seriously book the appointment. The atmosphere and customer service is absolutely perfect. I know, nothings perfect right. However, I never had an issue within the two years of being a client. Yes, I said never! They are courteous and happy individuals. My initial thoughts were within my first few visits that would change. Ha! It did not…I broke a wire which cause excruciating pain in my jaw. The office was closed. I received a call the next morning stating someone will open the office and take care of the issue right away. What time can you be here? I was completely blown away.

I definitely recommend Glass Orthodontics! My teeth are now perfect..I absolutely love my smile. Now if you are looking for me to post my before pictures. That’s not happening lol.

PS: Dr. Glass Apple playlist is a whole vibe lol. Thank me later 💜

resp.text: Thank you so much for this AWESOME 5 star review! We love what we do! You are an amazing patient and we are so very glad you trusted us with your smile😁 Looking forward to seeing you at your retainer check appointment ❤️

They even have a  emotional support dog who is super cute and chill lol. They make you feel welcomed and cared about . The building is so nice clean and organized. I would prefer Glass Orthodontics over anyone is. It’s a Yes for Me!!!♥️

name: Valerie Rodriguez
text:
Everyone you interact with is knowledgeable, patient, and concerned for your comfort and extremely caring and kind with your kiddos! They thoroughly explain the process, deliver the promised results. My oldest son just had his braces removed,  and his smile is beautiful. My youngest son just had his braces put on this week and we are expecting the same great results. All of the dental technicians are well trained and explain everything step by step. We especially appreciate Dr. Glass's personal involvement with the kids at every appointment and his positive encouragement. They are very responsive when you have an emergency and special attention. We believe they have developed the perfect formula for a well run orthodontic practice. And, they actually add some fun into the equation with special incentives and fun contests for the kids. If I had 10 kids, I would take each of them to Glass Orthodontics!
Sincerely,
Valerie and James Rodriguez
Robbie and Caleb

name: Hillary Lane
text: Dr. Glass and his staff have put all three of our children in braces, and we couldn’t be happier with the results! The team is extremely efficient (We’ve never waited more than five to ten minutes), upbeat, positive, knowledgeable, compassionate and great with both kids and teens! The office is a welcoming space that is always kept clean and tidy with games galore, plenty of reading material and hot coffee while you wait. I can’t say enough good things! Thank you Dr. Glass and Staff!

resp.text: Thank you very much for those AMAZING words about our office. We always love seeing you and yours!

name: Jennie Byrd
text: We have been extremely pleased with our experience at Glass Ortho so far!  The thing I appreciate the most is their honesty!  They are waiting to re-evaluate my child for braces after two consultations because her mouth is not ready and they are are trying to make sure not to put them on too early. I am grateful they are doing it this way instead of putting her in braces for longer than she needs. The staff is all very friendly and super helpful. We have been seen in Bay Minette and Daphne and recommend anyone give this practice a look when it is time for braces!  You will not be disappointed.

resp.text: Thank you Jennie!!! We greatly appreciate your kinds words about our office. We love what we do and we strive to provide you and your family with the exceptional customer service you deserve!

name: Lekeisha French
text: Dr. Glass and crew are the best. You get quick friendly service, everyone has a smile on there face. My son gained his confidence back. Loved the end result ❤️

resp.text: Thank you very much for the kind words about our office. We look forward to seeing you and your family soon!

name: Tasha Sprinkle
text:
My daughters have been patients of Dr. Glass for nine years.  We have such wonderful memories of all the appointments we've had to go to.  Dr. Glass and his staff have never kept us waiting or "run late" on any appointment we've ever had.
We never felt pressured into any treatment.  We received the facts and the choice was up to us.
Dr. Glass and his staff always make it fun for their patients with games and contests, etc...  We always felt like we were more than just another chart number.  Everyone always knew our name and remembered personal things about each person in our family.  That is a rare treasure to find.
Lastly, we always knew who we were going to see each time we stepped foot in the office.  The employees are dedicated, happy, and love what they do.  Thank you for all the years of service you provided for us!  Keep Smiling!!

name: Autumn Gann
text: Both of our children are patients of Dr. Glass.  They love coming to see him (which says a lot since braces aren't always comfortable)!  Dr. Glass has a great personality and is super easy to work with.  The office staff is also very welcoming and the kids also love his lobby!  We highly recommend Glass Orthodontics.

name: Hollie Elkins
text: The experience we have had with Dr. Glass and his amazing staff is absolute joy! He and his team make the entire process something my kids look forward to. We are kept well informed of the current progress as well as any anticipated progress to expect next. They have a relaxed, fun atmosphere in the office and plenty to keep the kids busy while they wait. (My son says he doesn’t get to “wait” long enough!) I drive an hour, one way, to see Dr. Glass and would never consider going anywhere else! I only wish I could give more than ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️! To say I trust his opinion is an understatement. Happy patient and mom here!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the very kind words about our office! We always love seeing you guys come in the door! It means so much to us that you guys travel so far to see us. We greatly appreciate it!!!

name: Scott Milroy
text: One orthodontist wanted to pull four healthy teeth to fix my bite.  Dr. Glass with no knowledge of what the other Dr. recommended, without hesitation told me he could fix my bite.  At 44 y, losing four healthy teeth was not an option.  So I asked how many teeth you will be pulling.  With confidence, he informed me I had plenty of room for the treatment he was recommending. “You can keep all your teeth”.  I now have a proper bite, great smile and the four healthy teeth the other orthodontist wanted to pull.  Needless to say, both of my children have great smiles because of Dr. Glass and all their teeth.  The staff is awesome, friendly and attentive.

name: Jennifer Angius
text: My family just moved to the area and had to transfer my childs treatment, saw great reviews for Dr. Petrunic and scheduled a consult with his office. I was absolutely shocked to walk in and see the complete disregard for others health during a worldwide pandemic! There were no precautions being taken...none! No temp check, everyone thrown into a small waiting area with no way to social distance, noone wearing masks or any type of PPE including those working in the office. The Dr. Came in the room with his mask on his chin( um, do you realize that doesn't work sir?) Within 12 inches of my child's face! I can expect when I go out in general public to encounter those who do not believe in science but this is supposed to be a professional business! Needless to say I found another orthodontist office who does take it seriously and definitely will not return to Dr. Petrunic.

name: B
text: Dr. Petrunic is the best I love how honest and understanding he is about my concerns with my sons teeth. He has some dental issues and I appreciate how Ms. Suzanne distracted him as the Dr. and I discussed the issues, without him listening and possibly feeling insecure or embarrassed while hearing our conversation. He's only 9 and we all know how sensitive little kids can be, so I appreciate how they worked as a team  to protect his feelings. This means the world to me how they put in so much effort. I can't thank them enough. If anyone is looking for an orthodontist that is kind, honest and caring this is the place, and to top it all off, your time is taken into consideration so they work hard to get you in and out in a timely manner.

name: Ivey Stratton
text: I went to PT orthodontics for a 2nd consultation to be sure I wanted to go to the first place. As soon as I walked in the door my experience was much better than the first. Charlene immediately greeted me and sat and talked with me about some of my concerns and then took me back to get pictures done. Dr. Todd then came in and went over a few options and courses that we could take. I told him a little about my lifestyle and we quickly picked the option that was best for me. After talking with them I was sure that I wanted to do it the same day and they were able to work me in. I decided to pay some down and do the payment plan which was quick and easy. The payment plan automatically takes the payment out of your checking account (not a card) which is really good for me because I am forgetful. We talked about the paperwork and then Charlene took me back to Hayes who put on my brackets with Dr. Todd. She talked me through everything she was doing which was really helpful because I had never worn braces before so this whole experience is new to me. When she was done she showed me how to brush with the braces and how to floss. She even told me what to do in case this this or this happened (I was really worried about something breaking and not knowing what to do so this made me feel a lot better.) She gave me a little bag and Charlene made my next appointment and I was out the door. The entire ordeal took about 2 hours and I was very pleased. My brother is 12 and he will get braces soon so he will definitely be coming to PT.

resp.text: Thank you so much Ivey!  We are excited to hear about your great experience and know that you and your brother will love your PT Ortho Smiles :)

name: Billingsley Terri
text: Excellent services provided by all staff that provided treatment... Shout out to Dr Whitt & nurse Charlene EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE !!!

resp.text: Thank you so much!  We love our patients!

name: Tucker Reeves
text: Just wow! Don't even know where to start! The building itself is extremely nice and clean. Everyone of the staff members was extremely curtious, knowledgeable, and helpful! Within an hour I was finished with my X-rays and pictures. I was then seen by the orthodontist Dr. Whitt who was extremely kind, professional, and very informative. I was given the option of several care plans that would work for me... Even though I was told I was not a candidate per Candid. Im a grown man but about cried knowing I was in good hands. The team was upfront with cost and length of treatment. Once my care plan  was selected I had a 3D impression made, yes 3D! No nasty goop trays. All in all I had a care plan in place with payment plan and was out in less than two hours. I would highly recommend PT orthodontics to anyone willing to listen. Thank you PT Orthodontics for providing me hope that I will one day have the smile I've dreamed of.

resp.text: Thank you so much Tucker, we love hearing about your experience and can't wait to see your PT Ortho Smile :)

name: Rory Williams
text: Just got my braces off after a little over a year and a half, and I have to say that there is no way that the treatment process could have been any better. Dr. Todd did my initial consultation, and he gave me a clear and accurate idea of what to expect from treatment, how the treatment was going to take place and a rough estimate of the time required. Their prices are very competitive and there were no extras or hidden fees, everything was clearly presented from a financial standpoint. They use state of the art digital equipment to provide the most efficient care possible, which makes traditional impressions unnecessary, in fact the only time I had to do an impression the whole time I was there was to get my retainer. The best part of PT Ortho, however, is the atmosphere and how they really treat each and every patient as an individual. Combine that with the upbeat and friendly nature of the assistants, the cheerful music, and the relaxed setting - suddenly going to the orthodontist isn't a dreaded activity, in fact it was almost fun! I highly recommend this orthodontist to anyone, children and adults, who need or are considering treatment. You'll be greeted with a big smile when you walk in the door and will leave with an even bigger one when your treatment is complete!

name: Brandi Huguet
text:
The office was very polite, and have areas set up for the children to play. The low rating is for how the staff and dentist treated myself and my daughter. My 4 1/2 year old does really well with doctor offices and dentist as long as things are explained and she knows what to expect. For instance, she doesn’t cry when she gets a shot because she knows it coming and knows what to expect. I do understand that medical professionals need to do their job and get the information needed. I respect medical personnel and have good relationship with all my providers and my girls’ providers.
So why the low rating. For starters the moment we walked in to the examination room, the assistant shoved an iPad in my daughters face without my consent. Again, my daughter is very curious and likes to ask question and know whats going on. During the exam, the assistant kept asking my daughter questions, while she’s watching this show (expecting a 4 year old to multitask, wonderful). My daughter was great during the exam, everything was fine until the X-rays. The staff outright lied and said it wouldn’t hurt. They made me and my youngest daughter leave the room for the x-rays, which i was already uncomfortable with. After the first three x-rays, i hear screams on the last X-ray. I wanted to go in to calm her and help her through it but was not allowed. I saw two more nurses go in and heard more screaming... if i hadn’t had my 1 year old with me i would have burst in there; even now I feel horrible for not doing so. Anyway, after they got the final X-rays the dentist and assistant came back in to check her teeth. Of course she lost trust in them and was freaking out. I was trying to calm her down while they were talking over me and physically restraining my daughter without my consent. I signaled them to back off while i talked to her and calmed her down. We will never return there. I wish I would have just walked in there during the X-rays , grabbed her, and walked out. I DO NOT think it is acceptable in non emergency situations to hold a child down like they did, especially without my consent.

name: Tom Wilson
text: Really wish I could put zero stars. Completely unprofessional. My daughter's appointment was scheduled for 9:30. They called after 8am asking if I could bring her in 30 minutes early for her appointment. I made the necessary adjustments to get her from school earlier. I arrived at 8:47. Before I was done signing in the receptionist was already requesting payment for a service yet to be provided. I expressed my reluctance but paid anyway. Was told to sit in the waiting room and wait. After watching the receptionist play on her phone and scroll through yahoo news for a 40 minutes I finally went to the desk and asked if the dentist would be ready anytime soon. She went and ask and told me that the dentist wouldnt be ready for another 30 to 40 minutes! I was furious that they called me in early just to tell me they were running late and at no point were they ever gonna let me know. I asked if they needed to reschedule my daughter and the woman could only say "I dont know...do you?." I finally had enough and said yes to reschedule for Oct. 3rd and demanded a refund of my money they were so eager to take. After waiting over 3 weeks for my daughters appointment they sent a letter saying she had been released from their practice. All because I called them out on their unprofessional practices. Do not take your children here! Worst staff ever.

It seemed as if everyone I questioned, highly recommended Lakeside Orthodontics.  My experience while they put Haley into braces was very positive, comforting, & they made us feel at home.  Both Orthodontists & staff were very knowledgeable, professional, & happy to answer each of my many questions.  I am very pleased with every aspect of our visit, & cannot wait to go back for her checkup!

text: Had braces from Dr. Hufham 15 years ago between the ages of 13-15. He saw symptoms of a bad bite when getting my braces taken off. Instead of recognizing the problem, he ignored it. Had he been trained in recognizing misalignment in the jaws, I would have avoided years of pain and would have received the surgery earlier in life. I would never recommend Dr. Hufham.

text: Dr. Sample and his staff are wonderful. From the very first consultation through the entire orthodontics process, they made us feel comfortable and cared for. The on-call assistant calls immediately back in an emergency. The entire team is friendly and professional.

name: Traci Gladish
text: We used Dr. sample for all four of my children. He and his staff were very attentive and kind. We were always treated well and never had to wait for an extended period of time. We love Sample Orthodontics!

name: Stephanie Summerford
text: Dr. Sample and his staff are a friendly group that make you feel welcome from the moment the door opens! We are just starting the process of orthodontic treatment and could not be more pleased with our decision to use Dr. Sample! They are super friendly, quick and efficient! The office is clean and organized helping everything to flow very smoothly!  Highly recommend using him for any orthodontic needs!

name: David Evans
text: Their financial practices are bad.   They are an in-network provider to my dental insurance (Delta Dental), and the office demanded that I pay in full for my services, then the reimbursement check went to them, then they sat on it for a few weeks, then finally sent the money to me after I called them about 5 times to send me my money.  I will not use Dr. Sample any more for my other kids.

name: Kerri Cole
text: Dr sample is the best orthodontist around. His prices are amazing and the staff is friendly and patient. They are willing to work with you. Not to mention my daughter got her braces off and her teeth started shifting. This was not Dr samples fault just something that happened!!! But to show you how amazing Dr sample is he is going to fix the problem at no extra cost because my daughter was following all the rules and doing every thing she was supposed to it just happened.This was a blessing for me because my family is low income and I really couldn't afford another set of braces right now!! Thank you so much dr sample for making braces for my child affordable and possible!!!!!:)

name: Matt Holmes
text: The staff at Sample's Ortho are always delightful and helpful to me as a parent but also to my children as they come in worried about braces.  They have made this a great experience.

name: Ally Sullivan
text:
I don't believe I can truly express how great Dr. Weissman and her team have treated me and my smile. I have never encountered such genuine, caring employees other than at Great Smiles!

My smile has always been my biggest insecurity and is the very first thing I examine about a photo of myself prior to deciding if I like the photo or not. I have some very stubborn teeth to say the least. I am currently in Invisalign and could not say a negative word about it! I am halfway through my treatment, and I already have grown in my confidence when it comes to my smile and overall appearance.

THANK YOU to everyone in this office who has made me feel comfortable, confident, and most of all - important. It truly goes a long way. <3

name: Beth Middleton
text: I am beyond pleased with Dr Sherri Weissman and her team for helping me get a great healthy looking smile and feeling better about my teeth. My overbite was completely corrected without surgery . I’ve had major improvements to TMJ. I persevered through some pain but it was SO WORTH IT!! I HIGHLY RECOMMEND Dr Weismann to anyone, young or older like me. She’s simply AWESOME  in my book. I’m very thankful for her knowledge of Invisalign . I would do it all again to achieve what they did!! Great Team!!!

name: Dave V
text: I had traditonal braces as an adult with Dr Weissman ending in 2008 and returned in 2020 for a couple areas I still wanted to fix. Dr Weissman and her team took great care of me and I finished the Invisalign system in 9 months and could not be more pleased. The staff are great and the treatment plan.and costs were presented to me during a free consultation with no pressure. It was an easy decision. Please go visit Dr Weismann if you have even simply wondered about  orthodontia or are just not 100% happy with your smile and want to know what your options....they will do a great job for you.

name: Kaitlin Graves
text: Amazing staff! From behind the desk to chair side, they are all so kind and helpful. We are so pleased with the results we received from our 3 kids having braces here at Great Smiles!

name: Laney Harvison
text: We have had an A+ experience at Great Smiles Orthodontics in Inverness. The staff is always warm and friendly. The attractiveness of the office can’t be beat. It is always decorated for the seasons. They go out of their way to make the visits fun during the holidays with hot cocoa during Christmas and Valentine treats in February. Dr. Weissman is an excellent Orthodontist who is extremely knowledgeable and also kind. She is always happy to see her patients . We cannot recommend this place enough! We will miss our visits now that my daughter has gotten her braces off.

resp.text: Thank you so much!! We enjoyed having Laney as a patient and are thrilled we provided her a "Great Smile"

text: I love this place they always welcome me with a smile I’ve never had a bad experience 10/10

text: So efficient and nice. Took time to explain what they were going to do, what they were currently doing and if we had questions. In and out in about 40 minutes for initial consultation. As a mom I left feeling informed and glad I made the appointment.  Would highly recommend.

text: We absolutely love Dr. Savage and her exceptional team!  My entire household has been a patient of Dr. Savage's at one time or another, so we are all smiles around here...:>)  I can't speak highly enough of the professionalism of everyone there as well as their overall concern and knowledge to help us accomplish our goals.  If you are considering any sort of orthodontic treatment, this is the place to go!

text: This office is amazing! Dr. Wiseman is very passionate about getting your teeth in tip top shape.  The staff is so welcoming and personable~ from Allison at the front desk to experts in the construction area or shall I say the freezer😂😂!   Yes it's very cold in the work area, BUT, they have warm fuzzy MONOGRAMMED blankets for you "low iron folks" such as myself.  They have everything you need!!  Try them out...My entire family wears braces right now and it's been such a pleasure.

Thank you so much to the Great Smiles family for always taking such good care of us!!!!

Great Smiles Orthodontics - Inverness

text:
Awesome staff , Very friendly environment.  A++
EXCELLENT RESULTS,  THANK YOU GREAT SMILES
CHRIS

name: Rosa Patterson
text: This establishment is exceptional! Each visit feels like a “V.I.P. Treatment”. Great Smiles has such a family oriented atmosphere. I love it! Once you enter, you’re greeted with a warm friendly welcome from Allison or GiGi. The turn around time baffles me. I don’t understand how each patient gets such a thorough one on one examination; yet, you’re not in the office all day??? Kathryn and Casey are experienced, well-trained, diligent and patient angels. Dr. Weissman and Dr. Law are extremely knowledgeable and hands on. They take time out to carefully explain each plan of action for every visit. I love how they don’t treat each patient or case as a number. My teeth really appreciates the effectiveness of this team. Thanks to Great Smiles, I now effortlessly exude confidence and for that... I am grateful.

text: I absolutely LOVE them! They are all so great. My daughter feels so comfortable here, and looks forward the her next appointments. Wish there were 10 stars!

name: Poine Dexter
text: Visited this location to have a permanent lower retainer reinstalled.  The service was 1st class!!!!  Although, I wanted my time to be limited to addressing my concern, the consultation was informative and worth the wait.  The onboarding representative was highly professional, sweet and genuine.  Dr. Weissman, was awesome and a great sales woman!!!!  I haven't decided if I will move forward with their recommendations but I can say that I have already referred two people to visit this orthodontist for service.  When I searched for an orthodontist to assist my need, I searched and inquired base on reviews and the star rating.  I will have to say this place is unequivocally the best example of customer service, not just for their field of expertise or industry, but an example for any business on how to care for the customer.

text: No practice in Birmingham can match the quality and professionalism of Great Smiles. Dr. Weissman leads her team by her caring example. They were patient with him and always treated him with respect. Dr. Weissman is a gift from God.

text: Stop searching. This is THE place to get braces for any child and/or adult. I can confirm this beyond my personal experience, as the current and former art teacher of some 20+ kids I saw at Great Smiles over the past 1.6 years. They love Dr. Weissman and Dr. Law - and maybe even more so - the awesome staff. A big hug and thank you to each and every one of them!

name: Dana Aycock
text:
I am completely satisfied with my experience with Bowen Orthodontics.

The staff is beyond helpful and so personable too! They always ensure I am comfortable during my adjustments and always talk to me about how I am doing. The Bowen staff makes you feel very at home. They really care about their patients.

I like that they explain the entire process of what they are doing during the adjustments and when the braces are initially put on, so you know exactly what is going on at the time. They also explain what the plan is for your next visit so you will know what to expect. I never have to wait long at my appointments.

I would recommend Bowen Orthodontics to anyone who is considering braces. Their pricing is fair and affordable. I actually saved a little money using them instead of other local orthodontics, but I would be more than happy to pay more just for their outstanding customer service!

I hate having braces but the Bowen staff has made this experience much more pleasant.

name: Alex Mays
text:
There are so many wonderful things to say about Dr. Dominique Backus and her team, It's hard to know where to start...

From the moment you first walk through the door, you are treated, not just as a patient on the schedule, but as family. You are ALWAYS greeted by name and with a huge smile. (And don't even get me started on the inviting aroma put off by the homemade chocolate chip cookies. YES, you read that right, they literally make homemade chocolate chip cookies EVERY morning for patients to enjoy! And they have like 9 different flavors of coffee, which is a HUGE perk for a working mom like myself!) The office itself is absolutely beautiful with a game room for children, comfortable seating with charging stations and some amazing art highlighting our awesome city! They even have really cool monthly contests for patients with really awesome prizes! It is the little touches like these that make this office one I actually enjoy coming to...and I haven't even discussed my treatment yet!

Aside from the overall aesthetics of Dr. Backus's office, the level of exceptional care you will receive is unparalleled in my opinion. From the moment I sat down with Dr. Backus and her Treatment Coordinator, I was a patient for life! I was so hesitant about getting braces (I am in my 30s), but they made me feel so comfortable about my decision. The consultation was informative, fun and really interesting! You get your own personalized treatment plan, a breakdown of your financial plan and just an overall sense of knowing that you will be taken care of. They even have the Financial Coordinator available that day to discuss any questions you may have which is a huge plus, because I know nothing about dental insurance, haha!

My treatment far exceeded my expectations. Dr. Backus's attention to detail is remarkable. With every appointment, she was able to explain to me exactly what needed to happen in order to create my perfect smile. I was blown away! The level of professionalism from each and every team member cannot go without mentioning either. They had the greatest chair side manner and I truly looked forward to each appointment that I got to see them at! Every visit was fast and enjoyable and I can happily/proudly say, I even got my braces off earlier than expected (with good compliance of course) and am now rocking my gorgeous Backus Braces smile!

Overall, if you want a personalized treatment plan, a comfortable office, a very knowledgeable doctor and a thoroughly rewarding experience, you have to go see Dr. Dominique Backus. She puts the fun back in Orthodontics!

resp.text: Alex, WOW!!! Thank you SO much for your kind words! We are beyond lucky to have such wonderful patients like yourself! Looking forward to seeing you soon!

name: Rocio Castro
text: Dr. McKinney is awesome! I went to him to fix a big gap in front and center of my mouth. It turned out I still had my canine baby teeth never fell off so it left me with the gap. He sent me to see a surgeon to find out if my adult teeth could be pulled down and the surgeon stated it was too late and it was not likely it would be successful. So he suggested to work if straightening my teeth and closing the gap and then placing crowns on the baby teeth. So a little over a year later I completed my treatment and I feel like a new person. I now love to smile and not afraid to show my teeth! I love my smile now. And I’m so grateful I went to see Dr. McKinney. He’s a great orthodontist. I decided to go with Invisalign and my treatment wasn’t covered by ins. So I was put on a very affordable payment plan which is another reason I’m so grateful to his team because I could have never afford to pay the whole thing at once. Now I’m sons dentist recommends that he get braces and I’m making an appointment for him to see Dr. McKinney.

Maggie Mathis

name: Brenda Weaver
text: This was my second visit to the office in the last 6 months and I am so impressed with the Dentist, dental assistants and office staff.  I was visiting my inlaws in Sept. when I broke a tooth, the dentist they use in town was too busy to fit me in so we called here and they got me right in and pulled my tooth for a fraction of the cost and with great skill. This time I had a sore tooth and just called to see if I could get in sometime in the next week or two and I got in the very next day, he was able to explain the problem and line up a solution so quickly.We have had the same dentist back home for 24 years, I have been to him repeatedly for problems in that part of my mouth and in one session with this dentist he showed me the problem...Wow! I would recommend this office to anyone who needs a dentist.

resp.text: I'm so glad we could help find the problem. We look forward to seeing you again soon.

name: Andrea Forman
text: Very Disappointed!!!  Dr. Scott seemed very helpful the first visit and told me I had a wisdom tooth that had a cavity, the root was short and he could pop it out.  I agreed that when I came back for my cleaning, he could extract it. (Mind you, I had no pain from that tooth nor was it bothering me at all.) I went back for the cleaning/extraction and after a couple of tries, he couldn't pull it.  So he offered to fill it.  I asked if that would fix it and he said yes.  I agreed and paid for the filling.  That afternoon when the lidocaine wore off, I was crying in pain.  I couldn't sleep and could only get a small amount of relief for about an hour by taking ibuprofen and pain medication.  That was on Thursday and they were closed Friday. I called back on Monday and asked if Dr. Scott could see me because I was in terrible pain from the failed extraction.  I was offered an appointment the next day.  Later that morning, I was called and told there was an appointment available that day, when I agreed to take it, the lady asked if it was for a toothache only.  I told her no, explained the situation and she put me on hold.  A couple minutes later she came back and said Dr. Scott said there's nothing else he can do for you, you need to go to an oral surgeon.  She gave me the number to the surgeon, needless to say I have to have it surgically removed and a bone graft done as well.  I don't see why Dr. Scott couldn't have at least seen me to see if there was another issue that was caused by the failed extraction or to see why I am in so much pain.   I wish he hadn't tried to extract the tooth, especially when the root was curved and not able to be pulled.  I was so disappointed.  I won't be returning as a patient at Southern Smiles.

resp.text: Andrea, I'm sorry you had a bad experience with us. We always try to offer the best possible treatment for each of our patients. I won't go into the actual details of your case on a public forum, but as you can see by our other reviews, you are very much the exception to most of the patients that we see.

Who'd ever have thought that a visit to the dentist could be a good thing and a high point in someone's day?  Only here, at Southern Smiles is that true.

text: Both gentlemen, as well as their staff, made a world of difference for my child. They were very kind, caring, and compassionate. They were incredibly generous with their time and resources, and it made a world of difference for my daughter, and our family. We drove from Mississippi just to see Dr. Langley, and each person we encountered while we were there was extremely professional. I highly recommend both of these gentlemen! They genuinely care about what they do, and every patient they see.

name: Manisha Patel
text: The staff at South Alabama Orthodontics are amazing. Everybody at the office is so friendly and caring. I had a lot of questions and concerns throughout my treatment and they listen and patiently answer every one of them. I was somewhat of a difficult case but everyone there made me feel at ease. I truly appreciate everything that Dr. Langley, Dr. O'Neil and the staff has done for me. I highly recommend SAO! I will definitely miss seeing their faces every few weeks.

name: Hayley Howell
text: I was referred by an old orthodontist back home in Tuscaloosa. The staff at South Alabama Orthodontics are amazing. The atmosphere is kid and parent friendly. There is a room where kids can play and there is a coffee bar with cookies to indulge in.The staff is polite and willing to help. I originally came in to have a tooth replaced to conceal the space after implant surgery. Then Dr. O’Neil explained that I would benefit from a procedure known as a gingivectomy. They also provided me with a brand new retainer. All of this was done free of charge. I appreciate everything that this practice has done for me. I would recommend this facility to anyone!!

name: Alethia Smith
text: I've been a patient with this business for a few years now and this year, my braces are coming off very soon.  I have nothing bad to say about none of the people that work here. All are very friendly and professional and I greatly appreciate them for giving me the upmost love and respect with treating the patients, like family. My teeth looks fantastic and I just want to thank the workers for such a beautiful job!!!! I'd recommend anyone here. Dr. Rick & Dr Shane are great people and they always make me feel welcomed with open arms!!!!

name: Brent Walker
text: Amazing people with amazing results.  I was a difficult case that required braces as well as jaw surgery.  From the beginning, Dr Langley explained the entire course of treatment, what would be involved and gave a more in depth explanation of the jaw surgery I would have than the actually surgeon who did the procedure.  The day of my surgery, both Dr Langley and Dr O’Neil, took the time to drive to Mobile and visit me in the hospital.  From day one, the drs and staff made me feel like family.  I am thrilled with the results and actually miss seeing the staff for my monthly appointments.

Grateful for SAO and I'd recommend them to everyone!

name: It's Belle
text: My experience with South Alabama Orthodontics in Daphne has been by far the best experience in my whole life. First the staff, by far the best staff I have encountered in my life. They all know what to do and they treat you like you are family. Second, having my braces has changed my life. I was made fun of, and felt so ugly before my braces. But within two and a half years I could smile, feel beautiful and be very proud of myself. name: Rob Co
text:
Update:
I came here 20ish years ago for braces. 4 years ago I came in for a repair, and today came in again to speak with the orthodontist about a new retainer. Would recommend this practice! They are friendly and professional.

resp.text: Hey Rob, you don't know me but this is Dr. Langley. I am sorry that you had this experience with our practice and I can assure you that we treat all of our patients both new and old with the same care. We recently changed software and the iPad to check in has been giving us problems. There is no excuse for ever being made to feel the way you did and the issue with the front office staff has been addressed. We pride ourselves on great customer service and your review has been helpful to me for training purposes. I want to give you a heart-felt apology and say that I am sorry. I want you to be happy and to regain confidence in our practice. I think there was a little miscommunication or lack of information with the retainer repair.  We routinely repair retainers in the manner that you described because we don't want to take off something that has been in place and functioning well for so long as it has in your case (open a can of worms). Not to get too technical but the bond strength is often reduced when the retainer is removed completely and replaced. I would love the ability to make things right by you. Please feel free to call me anytime my cell number is 251-604-5759. Also, if you would like to have the complete retainer replaced, i would be happy arrange for that at your convenience. Please give me the opportunity to make you happy.

name: Danny Nicholson
text: Great service, everyone is super friendly. The women there are beautiful as well ^.^ Lastly, my teeth look phenomenal!!!

name: Monica Ailea
text: I just want to say that this office and Dr. Langley were so great with my son. He did the frenotomy on my son. He took us even though we were late and they were already closed. There was a complication and Dr. Langley was with us the whole time texting and calling at 2 in the morning to help us with the issue. He helped us find a Dr (Dr. Wallender) in town that could fix the issue. I am so greatful that he helped us find what we needed and get the right source of the problem. He was checking in on us to see if Logan was ok. I am so greatful for Dr. Langley and for what he did for us! Great office and great customer service!

I cannot say enough good things about the doctors & staff at SAO and I will always recommend SAO to my friends and family.

Tina Hamric

She used it like 3 times the first day!! Whatever it was they said to her really impressed upon her the importance of keeping the braces (& her mouth) clean & healthy!! THANK YOU for that!! name: dhrachth1
text:
An expensive mistake.

Their office is very nice and runs efficiently, however everything else was wrong.

First off, they didn't communicate what they were going to do before doing it.  If I'd been told I wouldn't be able to fully close my mouth for at least several months before they put on braces, I wouldn't have done it in the first place.

Secondly, they don't listen.  I had a wire tearing up one side of my mouth for over a week.  I complained to the assistants on three separate office visits before one of them finally got the doctor and he immediately saw the problem and fixed it.

The final straw was when I couldn't tolerate the braces any longer and they broke a corner off one of my front teeth when they pulled the brackets off.  No one said a word to me about what they'd done.  I discovered the corner missing after I got home.

And just to confirm my poor opinion of the practice, when I asked for a refund, citing my broken tooth and lack of confidence in the practice, the doctor did not come speak with me to discuss my issues.  I'd scheduled an appointment for that day and was at their office for about 45 minutes.  He had the time.

The bottom line is I'm out nearly $1400 plus whatever it's going to cost to fix what they broke.

name: Dana Brooke
text: The staff is always friendly and so helpful with any of my needs. My daughter loves Dr. Harvey and Dr.Thomas

name: Ashley Davis
text: On Thursday, Aug 30 I was in the office for my consultation.  During this time I was educated on my treatment plan and I was informed of the financial aspect.  I had my braces installed on Monday September 10th. I must say that the quality of customer service during both visits was excellent. The staff of Harvey and Thomas Orthodontics really meet and exceed all expectations.  I didn't have to wait for service, I was seen immediately upon arrival.  The staff is very professional and nice. I was acknowledged and greeted by everyone that I crossed paths with. They even addressed me by my name during interactions which don't happen in most practices. I was informed of every step thoughout the process. The facility was clean and organized. I would definitely recommend Harvey and Thomas to others. ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ Five star treatment. I want to offer extremely high praises for the staff of Harvey and Thomas Orthodontics.

text: I never thought I would be going through orthodontic treatment in my mid-30's, but here I am! It was certainly not a "fun" experience, but I never had anything less than a pleasant experience with this great group of people.  If you are looking into orthodontics for yourself or your child, definitely consult with Dr. Thames.  I am thrilled with my results, and I know it's because he took the time and care to formulate the right plan for me.

name: Josh Lee
text:
First of all... my daughter just got her braces off and they bribed her with some free stuff to give them not just a review but specifically for a 5 star google rating with a written statement... really! So this google rating is bogus.
I will say ultimately the results of the braces were satisfactory. But that’s where the good review ends.
We made the first appointment with them to just inquire about braces and how much they would be  and upon arrival they brought her in and started trying to put bands in her mouth without talking to me about money and using pictures that were three years old(we had taken her up there for a consultation when she was 10, she was 13 when the braces were put on. I got back those same pictures of her at 10years old today as the “before” pictures... yeah three years before the braces even started... wow! Did y’all not actually even have any real before pictures?) I had to say stop so that they would answer questions and realize they hadn’t even seen this girl in three years.
Then they put the braces on and half of them fell off within only a few hours of putting them on and we had to go back to have them fixed.
Then after giving them my bank account information they failed to draft the payment for a couple of months so I had to back pay them. I talked to several people about this issue to have it fixed and they did the same thing again.
Then I have a stepson that is using them and they have done the same thing to his account. Also multiple times they would change his appointments without even asking to see if it was good with us and just emailed the new date and time, how considerate.
Today we show up to have the braces removed and they tell me I have to pay them 134$ today. I was not told about this before today and when I inquired about why the charge today the receptionist was confused and told me a bunch of stuff that wasn’t even factual about the charge and my account. When I finally talked to someone who knew what they were talking about she told me that the last payment had been scheduled to come out in August(it’s july now) and that I needed to pay this today. I said that I would come get my daughter as I did not have the extra 134 dollars appropriated at the moment and to her credit she allowed me to keep the last payment in August and my daughter still got her braces off.
This is too many issues to deal with when you are paying someone $5000 dollars for their service.
I would not have wrote this review had I not learned that they bribed my child with free teeth whitener for a 5 star review.
I have an 11 yo daughter who will be needing braces and I’ll give you one guess as to which business won’t be doing them.

resp.text:
At Island Orthodontics, we are passionate about creating beautiful, healthy smiles for our patients.  We are fortunate that so many of our patients choose to leave 5 star reviews for us.  Although we can ask for a review, there is no way for us to be sure that we will be given a great 5 star review.  We are grateful for all of the kind words and reviews from our patients.  We are also grateful to treat your daughter and hope that she enjoys the beautiful result of her orthodontic treatment. I apologize for the confusion at the start of your daughter's treatment and that some brackets came off.
Occasionally salivary contamination of the bonding material occurs.  This can happen at any office. The doctor responsible for starting treatment and placing brackets is no longer employed with Island Orthodontics.  I also apologize for the miscommunication about the bill.  We finished orthodontic treatment one month earlier than estimated.  We sincerely wish the best for you and your family and that your daughter enjoys her smile.

name: Barbara Carlisle
text: I was hoping my 5 star might lend a hand in raising the reviews but I should have known they have straight 5's! Every single interaction I have had has always been pleasant. From the front desk to the individual techs and doctors themselves, they have been wonderful! Most of the visits had us out within 30 minutes. Even the longest visits, due to more intense work on the braces, we're shorter visits coml pared to the amount of time having to wait in a normal dentist or physician's office. They are very well organized. My sister originally went to Island Orthodontics. They were very happy with them as well. Great job everyone!

text: I went to Cumberland back in 2015 to get fillings and a root canal done. The worst place

name: Melissa Simmons
text: I went in last Saturday to get 4 wisdom tooth removed when I got back in the room for them to proceed to do the procedure I feel it was a rush job and they was just ready to go home dr. Kelly had no bedside manners in my opinion she was just ready to clock out to me I feel as if she was trying to talk me out of it after I paid cash money with no insurance to get it done after about four to five days at home I noticed the back of my teeth had a funny taste with something coming out of them I put a napkin in my mouth to find that it was yellow stuff coming out of it I immediately called the office on a Saturday during business hours no one ever picked up the phone after I got off work I proceeded to call back that night in the answering service picked up and I told her that someone needed to get in contact with me because it was an emergency and what the situation was this was Sunday it is now 4:10 p.m. Monday and no one has still contacted me I went to the emergency room on Sunday night and they told me the antibiotic that I got with the procedure that I had I should not have that antibiotic they put me on more antibiotics of which I had to pay for my ER visit but long story short I wouldn't recommend taking a dog to this place with no one contact you about an emergency that is a red flag!!!!!

text:
Scheduling an appointment with this place is a nightmare!!  If I would have known that it would be this bad I would have NEVER brought my kids here!  They told me after the fact if I wanted priority appointments that fit my schedule I would have to pay $1000.00 EXTRA.  I have never heard or dealt with a doctors office who does business this way.  I am very disappointed and dissatisfied!  I would have not clicked any stars but you have to click at least one to be able to post!

Yes you do charge an extra fee.  The office manager called me stating she spoke with the owner and I could pay $1000.00 to be able to have priority scheduling.  In which I declined.  Like I said before I have never dealt with anyone who does business this way.

resp.text: We are sorry to hear that you are having difficulty in scheduling your appointments. We will have an office manager reach out to you to see if we can help. It is our company policy to have patients alternate between afternoon and morning appointments to allow all patients the option to have access to our most preferred appointment times.  Under certain circumstances we can make exceptions to work with our patients. Our company also does offer upgraded treatment options that include several additional benefits and one of those benefits is preferred appointment times.  However, we do not charge an extra fee just for preferred scheduling.

name: minnie killen
text:
I went to this dentist close when they first opened up.
They really really damaged my mouth.
They said they did 3 fillings but really did four... Not only that but they drilled to far and unfortunately i had to have all of them pulled. I had 3 surgeries trying to correct their mistake before we just had them pulled. i did try to reach out to them but when i called expressing something was wrong the lady in the front wouldnt listen and instead said they would look at it but in a month and said we needed to try and get the others. I had to then switch dentists and since then im terrified to even attempt to get something as small as a filling.

resp.text: Thanks for taking the time to leave us a review. Very sorry your experience wasn’t what you’d hoped. Our team will look into this.

name: Starr Lehner
text:
While I was saying wrong tooth she kept pulling stating she'll get it. I asked why won't it come out. She stated she'll get it.
So she pulled the good tooth and left decayed abcessed tooth beside it.
Wouldn't let me see tooth she pulled.
Had to go to another dentist who very easily pulled decayed tooth. He asked why she pulled wrong tooth.
When partial I've had more than 30 yrs wouldn't fit back I stated maybe because when you pulled tooth the others moved. Oh no that didn't happen. So she grinded on my partial making it for first time ever loose.
Well went back to get partial and they added a metal loop and wrapped it around another decayed tooth. Recently found out (from Dr)acid reflux quickly ruined my teeth. Always was complimented on my teeth and the care I took. So of course it broke off completely.
Of course Signature Smile wants their co-pay money. I sent what I could. Still I suffer. No apology.
Since the ordeal I've dealt with parotid gland pain.
I'm sure because I'm poor and on Medicare (cancer) I just don't meet their standard of a wealthy christian person so it doesn't matter. Wish I could post pictures of my mouth and what I live with because of them.

resp.text:
Starr,

We have tried contacting you directly regarding your review. Our records regarding the visits you mentioned are from 2017 and 2018, and we have documented consents for the treatment you requested. You also have recurring visits for comprehensive care after the treatment was completed, with no complaints or regard for any issues you mentioned in your review. We are happy to discuss this with you further. Our main priority is to give patients high quality care for their dental health and needs. We hope to hear from you soon!

Signature Smile

name: Chris K. Northington
text: I can not say enough good things about Dr. Wilson and his staff at Signature Smile.  They are without a doubt the best Dental practice I have ever been to.  We turned to them to fix my wife's implants/crowns when no-one else in the area could make them look right.  From the moment we walked in the door, we were greeting with compassion and understanding, and assured that they could fix her crowns.  They immediately scheduled an appoint for that same week to do her evaluation.  In that first appointment, Dr. Wilson laid out exactly what needed to be done, gave us a time frame for the work to be completed with cost estimates, and hand made her a set of temporaries that looked better than any of the final crowns from the other dentists we had worked with.  He performed laser dentistry on her gums to give her a bigger smile, used the KOR whitening system to give her a bright white color to her teeth, and put on two new crowns that he gets from a lab in Hollywood, CA.  I can proudly say today that my wife has a beautiful smile that she is so proud of thanks to the work of Dr. Wilson and his staff at Signature Smiles.  They are now offering laser filings that can be done with no numbing or drilling.  If you are a new patient, they offer a free Smile Evaluation that includes a panoramic X-ray.  I have referred many customers to them because of my belief in the work they do.

name: L “lalani wuto” M
text: I have had several occasions to visit Dr. Wilson's dental practice.  I have not ever had less than a wonderful experience.  From cleaning to root canal services, I have had comfortable, painless, and easy sessions with Dr. Wilson and the staff.  He utilizes the latest technology including laser, easy and non invasive X-Ray sessions, and new ways of imagery when viewing bone structure.  I want to also send accolades to the front reception area as well.  The associates are so very friendly and helpful.  They were a great help with my insurance questions and very helpful on every thing I needed as far as administrative information.  I have never had to wait too long for my appointments and felt like I was always visiting family.

name: Mary Robinson
text:
I recently won a Sheer Whitening Gift Certificate at Blue valued at $149. I scheduled my appointment with the dental rep and asked what I could expect. She told me to plan to be there about an hour. They would clean, polish and then give me the Sheer Whitening treatments. Wow, I thought, pretty good prize. I proceeded to ask what kind of whitening treatments they used, 5 day strips, ugh, I thought, oh well.

Unfortunately, I arrived for my appointment about 10 minutes late, however, not intentional. The receptionist was a bit unfriendly and I thought maybe it was because I was late. Shortly, a dental assistant came to me with a clip board and 5 pages to fill out. I completed my basic information and soon realized they were wanting more info than was totally necessary to claim a prize. I began scanning over the pages and stopped immediately. They were asking me everything from signing to consent to pay for the charges they would render to me today and insurance could not be filed to authorizing them to obtain my dental records from my current dentist. I proceeded to the receptionist and told her there was obviously a mistake, I was asked to fill out patient paperwork and that I was only there to redeem my gift certificate. She told me to proceed completing the paperwork so that they could keep it on file. I looked at her in disbelief and sat back down placing the pen under the clip. I guess she signaled the assistant who came out and retrieved my paperwork. I waited for over 30 minutes before they called me back. I followed the assistant back to a dental room and she handed me a box of strips and about 5 minutes of instruction. Do you have any questions? I said, "Are we done?", she said yes that's it. Hmm, so they led me to believe that the cleaning and polishing were part of my prize when really they were going to bill me for this when they were finished. I guess I didn't fall for their trap. Talk about deceitful, a good reputable business does not do business this way. I will not be back. I will still use my strips, but could have got them at Wal-mart for $12.00. What a joke. Watch out?

name: Keisha B.
text: I went in for a regular cleaning. Morgan is AMAZING! She was kind, gentle, and thorough. Not only that, her encouraging words actually motivated me to floss on a regular basis. Amanda was great too. She was able to answer my questions about dental work I plan to complete. Great experience overall. Dr.Alongi and his staff are the ultimate professionals.

text: Very unprofessional online presence for a medical professional.

name: Freeman I
text: A+. I really enjoyed this dental visit.  I received a well-performed cleaning and thorough dental exam. I just moved here from Washington, D.C., and I am glad to have chosen this office as my "dental home." I never remember receiving a cleaning/exam as occurred at this office. The hygienist was also very nice and likewise for Dr. Alongi. They were very personal and made me comfortable throughout the process. I am actually looking forward to the next visit. Thank you.

name: G-Baby 256
text: I'm going to have to give Dr. Alongi office a 2-star rating. Only because I had got a crown put in and for a while the color stayed the same and I was very happy with my crown but suddenly it started turning brown I reached out to the doctor's office and ask them is there anything we can do to lift the stain on my porcelain Crown they informed me that I have to spend $600 on another tooth that they could not remove the stain and they're sorry but they can't help me when I feel as if that should not be the case at all Dentistry has been around for years you mean to tell me that you cannot remove a smoke stain off of a tooth that someone spend $600 I just don't get it I'm really upset with Dr. Alongi office and I will be giving a 2 star rating I feel like there not sorry or trying to help resolve my problem there just like oh well I feel robbed. They start off great as do all things when it's fake and then there true colors show I really thought we were family I've been a patient for 11 years and this is how it ends.

text: Dr Sarver did my braces many moons ago(20+ years) and I still feel my teeth are perfect, we are now using Dr Sarver again for my daughters braces... she's getting close to being done. We love Dr Sarver and ALL of his staff.

text: Dr. Sarver and Erica did a phenomenal job. Especially with all the COVID-19 still around, they had in place procedures that give you confidence such as staggering entrance into office, use of face masks, face guards and gloves while performing services, sanitizing the pen before handing it to you and even using a sanitizing wipe on your credit card before returning it to you. Just great! I will say that the practice has always been great aside from the new COVID-19 measures. I never had to wait more than a few minutes after an appointment time and they always make it a point to be respectful of your time. I usually have Amber and she does an excellent job as well. Overall I am very pleased with Dr. Sarver and his team. They really make it point to make perfecting your smile their priority and no matter how long it takes Dr. Sarver really listens to you and makes adjustments to ensure you leave with a great smile and healthy bite pattern.

text: My daughter and I came in for a consultation today for braces. The staff was upbeat and so friendly. We are new to town, but felt right at home. They were timely and when we met Dr. Sarver it was the icing on the cake. He was funny, so nice and spent good quality time with us. My daughter made a comment how excited she was to go back and how nice everyone was. I would recommend Dr. Sarver Orthodontics 100%.

name: Hansen Lister
text: Sarver orthodontics is simply the best... and by the way I went to 4 orthodontist evals.  I may sound crazy, but I had 4 kids that ALL needed braces and this momma takes stuff seriously.  Dr Sarver was clearly the best choice. We loved his enthusiasm and how he strives for perfection.  His treatment regimen was much more aggressive than the other orthodontics and I knew beyond a shadow of a doubt they my children would leave his care with a beautiful smile!  The staff is stellar as well.  They are the perfect combination of fun, cool, thorough and professional.  They always answered my questions and communication was perfect!  Anyway if you or your children need orthodontic treatment... I can save you some time and trouble... let David Sarver fix you up!

text: The service from the front to the back is impeccably great with genuine concern and greeting from the receptionist and all staff. Dr.Sarver's continuous research allows him to be first class in the ortho world-I got 2 opinions from ortho's before choosing this office. Dr.Sarver explains his treatment plan and why he is choosing it.

resp.text: We are so glad you chose us for your orthodontic needs!! Dr. Sarver prides himself on staying on the cutting edge of technology and knowledge. Thank you for this awesome review.

name: Jonathan Dunwoody
text: Dr. Sarver and his crew are awesome!!!  When they first helped me back in the mid 80s I was called "gums" because of my overbite in middle school.  They corrected that over the course of a few years and I get compliments on my teeth to this day!  My permanent retainers were put on maybe 1990 and I asked when they could come off.  I'll never forget him saying maybe when you bring your kids in to see me.  The top retainer finally broke a couple of years ago(after 25 years +)  and my teeth actually shifted because I took too long to get back to see them.  They corrected my teeth again and I'm the proud new owner of a permanent top retainer again!  I can't say thank you enough to Dr. Sarver, Rebecca, and the rest of the awesome folks there!

resp.text: Excellent, Jonathan. Nice perspective and thanks for uplifting Rebecca

name: Shawntae Nettles
text: What can I say....Dr Sarver is the best! It all started with a simple question from my regular dentist about correcting my smile. Once I learned what was needed to correct it and that insurance covered the jaw surgery, I took the necessary steps to get started. My dentist Dr Wright referred me to my oral surgeon Dr Louis who then referred me to Dr Sarver. I spent  like 1 year in braces before going under the knife for jaw surgery. Afterwards I spent another 1 year and a half or more in braces. I went through a lot to get my smile where it is today, but I don't regret any of it. If you're looking to correct your smile or teeth then look no further than Dr Sarver and his staff. They are all well educated and are very nice.Thanks for giving me that perfect smile once and for al!

resp.text: Thank  you for your kinds words. Your results are amazing and you have a great smile! We are so glad you allowed us to care for you and help you make the decisions that would lead to the best results. We love our patient family!!

name: Katherine Weitzman
text:
Wow! I've been walking around in a dream all day. I can't believe that finally my braces are off! It took several visits over three years I think, but finally Dr. Sarver and his wonderful staff convinced me that I needed to go through this braces/jaw surgery treatment, and though some days have been hard, it's been worth every moment to get to today. I used to think that I couldn't get through it - that two years would be too much with the braces, but I'm here to tell you it went by very quickly and the results are worth it. I don't regret it one little bit! Dr. Sarver and his staff are amazing. I encourage anyone needing orthodontic treatment to make an appointment. I have to give a special shout out to Cynthia who always makes me laugh while handling my payments and to Erica who is a whiz at changing wires, etc. and making it quick and painless. Thanks to the entire Sarver "family."

Katherine R. Melvin

She also, had an appointment on the dentist side and the orthodontist . Now the orthodontist got her back  and then bought her back out for the dentist side. My daughter had to get a chip tooth that they had to filled. It took them from 130 to almost 245 for the dentist side to finish. I feel that they over booked their appointments . We didn’t get finish until 330pm. I thing they need to reorganized the why they make appointments doing the COVID 19 so parents aren’t sitting in a car for 2 or 3 hrs . Better planning. text: Love Vital Smiles for being multi-kid friendly,  however,  I feel the check in system could improve. Maybe off an online portal to update information prior to visit instead of having to physically fill out paper work. For the parent with multiples, this would alleviate unwanted anxiety of the child not being called back at their scheduled appointment time. It would also help, if all children of the same family finish together. Other than that, service is great, staff is friendly and knowledgeable!

name: Melody R
text: We used to like going here, never really had any problems. Of course there has always been a nice wait time but we decided to continue going there despite waiting a while to be seen. But this last time really made us change our mind. We have 3 children to receive updates on as they are being seen. As I sit down near my youngest daughter, and reach for my phone her hygienist tells me I have to leave because I have my phone out. I'm shocked, because I had just taken my phone out to return a text from my husband  as he wanted to know how the appointments were going. She would not continue my daughter's appointment until she escorted me out of the area. Now I completely understand businesses asking for cell phones to be turned on silent but to tell me that I cannot use my phone AT ALL is completely absurd! I have taken time from my off day to come to this business to bring my children and you're telling me I have to go to a consultation room just to use my phone.  I have already driven 30 minutes to come from my side of town, I  could have easily changed them to a Dr less than 5 minutes from home and had little to no wait time. In addition to all this, I'm trying to get information on my best friend who is in the ICU and no one knows what's going on because I can't use my phone to get the messages. Someone must have notified the manager because she came to talk, but she wanted to do it around my children and that was not going to happen. She should have asked to step away and then we could have talked.......... In other news, we won't be going  back.

text: We had a fantastic experience at this dentist office. The hygienist made it fun for my little girl and the doctor was professional and thorough in his exam but made it fun for the kids! We look forward to visiting them for years to come!

name: Tancy Hardee
text: Took in my daughter to have a chipped tooth fixed. 2 appointments later they fixed the wrong tooth. Dentist said come back next week because he didn't want to have to give e her more numbing medicine and he would not charge  me. Went back the 3rd time and he fixed the tooth. I they tried to make me pay even though he said he would not charge me.  Less than a year later the tooth is abscessed and I am still being harassed for payment.  Never go here these people are incompetent.

resp.text: Tancy, We've reviewed your file and are sorry for the misunderstanding. Due to HIPAA, we are unable to discuss your case online, but would love the opportunity to review your concerns over the phone. Please call our Practice Administrator, Bob, at 256.539.7447

name: brady glaus
text: Absolutely wonderful place and staff. Dr Lackey is top notch, knows teeth and children. Wish Tri-care was accepted, would love to have him continue work with my daughter.

resp.text: And we'd love to continue working with your daughter! Tri-care is actually a medical insurance rather than dental. Please contact us with your dental insurance information and we'll be happy to help. Look forward to hearing from you soon!

name: hannah stewart
text: The entire staff is excellent! From the sweet receptionist that helped me change my appoint location with no issues, the dental assistant that was patient and gentle with my daughter, to the Dentist who was friendly and knowledgeable. We had a wonderful experience and are looking forward to our next check up!

resp.text: Thanks for taking the time to leave this review. We certainly love helping and so glad we could! See you again in 6 months!!

name: Christina Morgan
text:
My kids (12, 5 , 3) we're pretty nervous to go to the new dentist. We were incredibly impressed from the moments we walked in the door! The facility itself is very welcoming for the kids and parents. There's a nice play area in the waiting room with toys, books, and video games. The front desk staff was quick and helpful checking us in for the first time.

When we got back to the treatment area, it was a large open room (with private rooms for procedures), and had a little waiting play area for kids who aren't actually on the exam table. They were very patient and understanding with my very little ones who were scared. My little ones cried, and they kindly helped them through it all. The dental himself was absolutely phenomenal! He was thorough, gave us good advice/tips, and my kids even had fun with him!

By the time we left, my kids wanted to know when we could come back!

resp.text: Wow! You managed to make our day. We look forward to seeing yall again.

name: Lisa Desgranges
text: The hygienists & other staff are so great here! My 5 year old jumps right in the chair with no reservations.  Very knowledgeable too.

resp.text: Thanks for your kind words! We love kids who are happy to jump right onto the chair and look forward to seeing you all again soon!

name: Mandy Davenport
text: Both of my boys love coming here! They make going to the dentist as fun as possible. Thank you for a great experience!

resp.text: And we love having them come! Thanks for letting us know and we look forward to seeing you again soon!

name: Christine K
text: Wow. How can you only take one kind of child on Medicaid but not the other. Ive got an autistic son n a daughter without special needs n yet yall only will take one n not the other. What kind of busniess is that..

resp.text: Thanks for your feedback. We are sorry that we were unable to meet your family's needs. Our mission is to create a fun, loving, and nurturing environment where children will feel comfortable, secure, and excited about dental care. We specifically focus our specialty services on children with special health care needs, including children with autism. We take pride in creating an environment of excellence by communicating with respect, seeing patients on time, and providing quality care that exceeds expectations. We truly value forming relationships with our families. While we are not  medicaid providers, our doctors have tried to meet a need in our area by providing care to all special needs children in North Alabama. We have provided this service to our community for over 50 years and hope to continue for many years to come.

text: Our experience with PT Orthodontics was nothing short of glorious! They had our daughter’s new retainer made and ready within 45 minutes! Their efficiency and excellence are unmatched! They treated us like family and made us feel welcome and important to them! May God bless them for their dedication to excellence!

name: Donna Lee
text:
Our daughter had to get braces last December and we were referred to Dr Ferreira and his team by our regular dentist. Our first impression was great. The office is clean and very modern and the staff is courteous and friendly and they were very clear in communicating the process our daughter would be going through the next two years. But after going to see Dr. Ferreira and his team for close to 5 months now, they are more than that. They truly care about her and care about what they do! They called to check on her after her initial visit, they make themselves available to you after hours, if needed, and they always make her feel important when she has a visit, which means more to me than they will ever know!
We are blessed to have them in our area!

Donna Zimmerman

name: Anna Scott
text: I am pleased at the quality of care received by Dr Ferreira. He chose not to pull a bunch of permanent teeth just to make room. That was extremely important to me. He took the time to explain the importance of saving permanent teeth, improving orthodontic results, and maintaining a healthy profile long term. The cost was the lowest in the area. It was easy to make appointments and we never had to wait long to be seen. The staff are very friendly and it was overall a great experience. We are very pleased with the final results and would highly recommend him to anyone needing quality orthodontics.

resp.text: I am so glad we were able to help him out, I hope you have a wonderful vacation in Alabama!

My daughter has a great smile now. Whenever she goes to the dentist or doctor we are always told her orthodontist did a great job. If you're looking for an excellent orthodontist, I would definitely recommend Dr. Ferriera and his staff  100%.

text: My daughter just got braces April 4th so up until this weekend we really wasn’t able to honestly review them yet. Advanced Orthodontics is definitely not like everyone else. Within a few minutes Christina called and explained in detail what to do, she was amazing. While I was working on what Christina told me to do, Dr. Ferreira calls to check on my daughter. Later on Christina calls back and checks on her again. Now here it is Monday morning and I just received another call from a different lady checking on my daughter. I couldn’t be more impressed with the level of compassion shown just this weekend. I will continue to brag about how amazing we were treated.

resp.text: Thank you for your thoughtful review.... It has been a pleasure to work with your family....

Dr. Ferreira is evaluating our youngest daughter twice a year and consulting with our dentist to try to minimize her time in braces.  He has a beautiful new office with modern equipment, televisions & game consoles for the kids. We are ALWAYS told how much time to allow for an appointment and are ALWAYS seen on time. Dr. Ferreira and his staff are always   professional, caring and courteous.  We have recommended him to several friends.  We can not imagine using anyone else!

Hope Lee

name: Garrett Dothard
text: I had to get braces December of 2012 and after considering the many options we had to decide between Dr. Ferreira or Dr. Bernardi, so we decided to get an evaluation with both. When I first walked into Dr. Ferreira's office my fist thoughts were, "This is too fancy to be affordable", but never judge a book by its cover, because if I had I would have made the wrong decision. After finally meeting and talking with Dr. Ferreira, I was thoroughly shocked at how his process of treatment could be so advanced but the price was essentially the same as Bernardi. Right then the choice was very clear to stay with Dr. Ferreira. And I can say now this has made all the difference. Ever since that decision has been reaffirmed time and time again, he always takes time out of his schedule to answer any questions I may have. Also, such as today he called and checked in to make sure everything was good with my braces, something you will almost NEVER find at another facility. Advanced Ortho. is simply astonishing when it comes to customer service. With wonderful staff and speedy service I would recommend this facility to anyone in need of orthodontic service.

text: Wonderful staff and so friendly at the Northcutt Dental located in Helena! I typically dread going to the dentist but everyone made sure I was comfortable. Definitely recommend this dental practice!!

name: Angel Tillman
text: I really wanted to like this dentist's office.  It's very efficient and clean.  The work is done promptly.  I did not care for the first hygienist I had, so I asked to have her replaced.  The second was much better and the third hygienist was the best I've ever had.  However, when I first switched to Northcutt, it was because my previous dentist retired.  I was told that a filling I had received needed to be replaced.  I was reluctant, because it wasn't giving me any pain or problems, but I had it replaced.  After the replacement, the dentist said he needed to replace his own work (no charge)  so he did.  Then I started having a lot of pain from the 2nd replacement.  He worked on it a 3rd time.  The last time I went in, he expressed that the whole tooth needed to be crowned - lest I eventually need a full root canal.  (this time charged of course)  Needless to say, I will have to be getting a second opinion.  I cannot have the same tooth worked on 5 times unless it truly is necessary.

text: The admin staff is friendly and the office is nice and clean. The porcelain crown I had done less than a year ago not only came off tonight but it also has a hole all the way through it. The assistant who adjusted it before it was cemented did not listen to anything I said when she was fitting and drilling on it. I told her the contacts were too tight, but she insisted on adjusting the occlusal (biting surface) until here we are less than a year later with a useless crown. Since we've already moved from Helena, I can't even get Northcutt Dental to make this right. Insurance only pays for 1 crown per tooth every 5 years... I would not recommend this place!

resp.text: I want to thank you for talking with us to discuss your issue. It is our goal to make sure our patients are raving fans of NDP and we want to do all that we can to address your needs upfront. We are sorry that you had this experience and hope you were pleased with our quick response & solution to your concern.
